title: My official semi-intermittent report of things to Rito
body:
Hey top 500 hours played on NA, an' player since before you had seasons here.
I give you loads of cash for glorified deviant art photos so you can keep up the maintenance of this great game we all love.
I'm pretty much an investor in your company at this point who just doesn't really get any returns, lol.
Anyway.
Could you do something about these people who, rather than delight in playing the game, find it more fun to abuse your behaviour system by finding ways to torment people with without suffering consequences?

I get that it's sort of an arms race kinda deal, but when I see the same problems persisting for many many updates in which you radically alter other aspects of the game before we'd even adjusted to the previous radical alteration of mechanics... well I just kinda get an itch.
Anyways, no biggie, keep up the good work!

More Taliyah skins though as well pls. {{champion:163}} 
♥

replies.body:
''who just doesn't really get any returns''

Except for the game and its features
I upvoted, but knowing the boards you will just get downvoted.
but .. they do get consequences. Just don't see them getting the consequence.

Watch as this gets massively downvoted for being a relatively positive post about riot.

Cant go against the current boards circlejerk.
